include/freebus-atmega168.h File Reference

Hardware specific options for the ATmega168, for board with RF. DO NOT INCLUDE THAT FILE DIRECTLY, include fb_hardware.h instead. More...

#include <inttypes.h>
#include <avr/io.h>
#include <avr/eeprom.h>
#include <avr/pgmspace.h>
#include <avr/interrupt.h>
#include <avr/wdt.h>
#include <avr/sleep.h>
#include <util/parity.h>
#include <util/delay.h>
#include <string.h>

#define ENABLE_IRQS   { if(_sreg & 0x80) sei(); }
 Enable IRQs if they are enabled before DISABLE_IRQS is called.

 Configure external INT0 to match falling edge and enable the interrupt.

 Clear overrun bit set for application timer.

 Enable PWM, PWM pin (PB3) is set by hardware.

 Disable PWM and set PWM pin to high.

Detailed Description

Hardware specific options for the ATmega168, for board with RF. DO NOT INCLUDE THAT FILE DIRECTLY, include fb_hardware.h instead.

Hardware specific options for the ATmega168P. DO NOT INCLUDE THAT FILE DIRECTLY, include fb_hardware.h instead.

Matthias Fechner, Christian Bode, Dirk Armbrust
Date:
Mon Jun 2 09:14:22 2008

Define Documentation

#define _FREEBUS_ATMEGA168_H

is defined if target system is the ATMega168

#define CLEAR_TIMER1_OVERRUN   TIFR1 = (1U<<OCF1A)

Clear overrun bit set for application timer.

Referenced by main().

#define CONFIG_EEPROM (  )
Value:
{                       \
        EECR |= (1 << EEPM1);                   \
        EECR &= ~(1 << EEPM0);                  \
    }

Execute some EEPROM specific commmands configure eeprom to only write and not delete before, that operation will take 1.8ms.

Referenced by eeprom_Init().

#define CONFIGURE_INT0 (  )
Value:
{           \
          EICRA |= (1<<ISC01);      /* Enable Int0 falling edge */    \
          EICRA &= ~(1<<ISC00);     /* Enable Int0 falling edge */    \
          EIMSK |= (1<<INT0);       /* Enable Int0 */                 \
     }

Configure external INT0 to match falling edge and enable the interrupt.

Referenced by fbhal_Init().

output port (byte) of CTRL pin

#define DISABLE_EEPROM_READY_INT (  )
Value:
{           \
        EECR &= ~(1U<<EERIE);                    \
    }

Disable the EEPROM ready interrupt.

Referenced by ISR().

#define DISABLE_IRQS   unsigned char _sreg = SREG; cli();

Disable IRQs, save status before doing this.

Referenced by AllocMsg(), dequeuemsg(), queuemsg(), and uart_putc().

#define DISABLE_PWM (  )
Value:
{                                   \
          TCCR2A &= ~((1<<COM2A1)|(1<<COM2A0)); /* disable PWM pin  */  \
          SETPIN_CTRL(ON);                     /* set port to high */   \
     }

Disable PWM and set PWM pin to high.

#define DISABLE_RX_INT (  )
Value:
{           \
          EIMSK &= ~(1<<INT0);                  \
     }

disable interrupt INT0

#define DISABLE_UART_TX_IRQ (  )
Value:
{                                 \
          UCSR0B &= ~(1<<TXCIE0);      /* disable transmit IRQ */     \
     }

Disable interrupt for UART0.

Referenced by ISR().

#define DISABLE_WATCHDOG (  )
Value:
{           \
          MCUSR = 0;                            \
          wdt_disable();                        \
     }

Disable internal hardware watchdog.

Referenced by main().

#define ENABLE_IRQS   { if(_sreg & 0x80) sei(); }

Enable IRQs if they are enabled before DISABLE_IRQS is called.

Referenced by AllocMsg(), dequeuemsg(), queuemsg(), and uart_putc().

#define ENABLE_PWM (   x )
Value:
{                                   \
          TCCR2A = (1<<WGM20)|(1<<COM2A1)|(1<<COM2A0);/* Phase correct PWM and enable OC2a pin */ \
          TCCR2B = (1<<CS21);     /* prescaler 8 */                     \
          TCNT2  = 0;             /* reset timer2 */                    \
          OCR2A  = (x);           /* defines the duty cycle */          \
     }

Enable PWM, PWM pin (PB3) is set by hardware.

Parameters:
xDuty-cycle (0xF2=6,3%, 0x01=100%)

Referenced by restartApplication(), and switchObjects().

#define ENABLE_RX_INT (  )
Value:
{           \
          EIFR   = (1<<INTF0);                  \
          EIMSK |= (1<<INT0);                   \
     }

clear pending interrupts INT0 and enable interrupt

Referenced by fbhal_Init().

#define ENABLE_UART_TX_IRQ (  )
Value:
{                            \
          UCSR0B |= (1<<TXCIE0);       /* enable transmit IRQ */ \
     }

Enable interrupt for UART0.

Referenced by trigger_uart().

#define ENABLE_WATCHDOG (   x )
Value:
{           \
          wdt_enable(x);                        \
     }

Enable internal hardware watchdog.

Referenced by fb_hal_restart(), and main().

#define INIT_EIB_TIMER (   vala,
  valb 
)
Value:
{ \
          TCCR0A = (1<<WGM01);     /*  CTC mode  */ \
          OCR0A = vala  ;  /* duration of one bit */ \
          OCR0B = valb  ;  \
     }

#define RELOAD_APPLICATION_TIMER (  )
Value:
{                                   \
          TCCR1A = 0;             /* CTC (Clear Timer on Compate match) */ \
          TCCR1B = (1U<<WGM12)|(1U<<CS11)|(1U<<CS10); /* CTC-mode, prescale to 64 */ \
          OCR1A  = 16249;         /* every 130 ms OCR1A=(delay*F_CPU)/(prescaler)-1 */ \
          TCNT1  = 0;             /* reset timer */                     \
     }

Reload the application timer (Timer1) to start from 0.

Referenced by restartApplication().

#define START_EIB_TIMER (   value )
Value:
{ \
          TCNT0  = value             ;            /* set start value */ \
          TIFR0  = (1<<OCF0A)|(1<<OCF0B) ;        /* clear pending interrups */ \
          TIMSK0 = (( 1<<OCIE0A )|( 1<<OCIE0B )); /* enable OCRA, OCRB interrupts */  \
          TCCR0B = (1<<CS01) ;                    /* start the timer, prescaler :8, increment each 1 sec */ \
    }
#define STOP_EIB_TIMER (  )
Value:
{ \
          TCCR0B = 0;      \
          TIMSK0 = 0;      \
    }
#define TIMER1_OVERRUN   (TIFR1 & (1U<<OCF1A))

Checkcondition for application timer overrun.

Referenced by main().

#define UART_SEND_BYTE (   tx_char )
Value:
{           \
          UDR0 =(uint8_t)(tx_char);             \
     }

Store one byte in UART0 send buffer.

Referenced by ISR(), and trigger_uart().
